dashboard.description: Get an overview of your tasks and progress, track metrics, all in one place.
dashboard.markCompletedMessage: Do you want to mark these tasks as completed?
dashboard.statusOverviewDescription: Breakdown of tasks by status categories.
dashboard.completedTasksDescription: Number of completed tasks each month.

tasks.taskDescriptionText: Organize, manage, and prioritize your tasks effortlessly to meet your deadlines.
tasks.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete these tasks?
tasks.taskMaxNameSizeValidation: The task name cannot exceed {{number}} characters.
tasks.taskMaxDescriptionSizeValidation: The task name cannot exceed {{number}} characters.
tasks.taskPriorityRequired: Please select a priority for the task.
tasks.taskPriorityInvalid: The selected priority is not valid.
tasks.taskStatusInvalid: The selected status is not valid.
tasks.taskStatusRequired: Please select a status for the task.
tasks.taskCategoryRequired: Please assign a category to the task.
tasks.taskDueDateInvalid: The due date must be later than the current date.

categories.emptyTasksWarning: No tasks associated with this category.
categories.description: Manage and personalize your categories tailored to your needs.
categories.tasksAssociatedWarning: Categories with assigned tasks cannot be edited or deleted.
categories.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete category {{name}}?

login.failedErrorMessage: Login failed. Please check your credentials

settings.description: Manage your account preferences and settings.
settings.usernameMinCharacters: Username must be at least {{number}} characters.
settings.passwordMinCharacters: Password must be at least {{number}} characters.
settings.passwordMinNumbers: Password must contain at least one number.
settings.passwordMinLowerCase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
settings.passwordMinUpperCase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
settings.passwordDescription: Change your password to keep your account secure.
settings.themeDescription: Customize the look and feel of the interface.

calendar.description: Visualize, edit, and delete your tasks effortlessly with the interactive calendar.
